pull.title: test: call VerifyLoadedChainstate during ChainTestingSetup

for additional coverage and similarity to actual init process.

Followup to #23280.

events.message:
test: call VerifyLoadedChainstate during ChainTestingSetup

for additional coverage and similarity to actual init process.

events.body: Should be a pretty easy review... @dongcarl maybe?

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -187,6 +187,16 @@ TestingSetup::TestingSetup(const std::string& chainName, const std::vector<const
         throw std::runtime_error("LoadGenesisBlock failed.");
comments.body: please rebase this on master, otherwise it is needlessly hard to review. I suspect this doesn't even compile?
any reason to call this rv instead of something that makes sense?

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -187,6 +187,16 @@ TestingSetup::TestingSetup(const std::string& chainName, const std::vector<const
         throw std::runtime_error("LoadGenesisBlock failed.");
comments.body: Not sure I follow, but it's been rebased.

```suggestion
        *Assert(m_node.chainman),
```

I think this should also compile?

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -195,6 +195,16 @@ TestingSetup::TestingSetup(const std::string& chainName, const std::vector<const
                              true);
     assert(!rv.has_value());
 
+    auto rv2 = VerifyLoadedChainstate(
+        *Assert(m_node.chainman.get()),
+        fReindex.load(),
+        m_args.GetBoolArg("-reindex-chainstate", false),
+        chainparams.GetConsensus(),
+        m_args.GetIntArg("-checkblocks", DEFAULT_CHECKBLOCKS),
+        m_args.GetIntArg("-checklevel", DEFAULT_CHECKLEVEL),
+        GetAdjustedTime);
comments.body: What is the reason to use this time?

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -187,6 +187,16 @@ TestingSetup::TestingSetup(const std::string& chainName, const std::vector<const
         throw std::runtime_error("LoadGenesisBlock failed.");
comments.body:
To see if a commit compiles locally, you can use `make`. For example this commit indeed fails:

```
$ git checkout 1c6f4e6fe07bb111dd40e6ebfb8936f49a51c2e3 && make 
HEAD is now at 1c6f4e6fe0 test: call VerifyLoadedChainstate during ChainTestingSetup
Making all in src

make[3]: Entering directory '/home/marco/workspace/btc_bitcoin_core'
make[3]: Leaving directory '/home/marco/workspace/btc_bitcoin_core'
  CXX      test/util/libtest_util_a-setup_common.o
test/util/setup_common.cpp:192:9: error: use of undeclared identifier 'fReindex'
        fReindex.load(),
        ^
1 error generated.

make[2]: Leaving directory '/home/marco/workspace/btc_bitcoin_core/src'
